member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Reports.Primitives.OverflowDialog
member.summary:
Represents an overflow dialog control.
In order to define transitions to open or close this control simple Storyboards can be defined in the resources of "Root" part (names OverflowDialog.CloseStoryboardName and OverflowDialog.OpenStoryboardName); can't trust the VSM because it doesn't always raise its events and this control MUST be sure to know when it's fully opened / closed
